item.title: Self Hosting and Securing Web Services Out of Your Home With Argo Tunnel
item.description: Table of Contents Why a tunnel? Cloudflare’s Argo Tunnel Pre-requisites 1. Install 2. Authenticate 3. Create tunnel 4. Create a configuration file 5. Modify your DNS zone 7. Test the Tunnel 8. Convert to a system service Final Thoughts Why a tunnel? Opening up a port on a home network isn’t the greatest idea. It is a security risk, a hole waiting for a hacker/bot to sneak in using a known vulnerability.
